snippet: Azeri lawmakers condemned the work, by an Azeri writer, and protesters burned his portrait outside his house, illustrating the depth of hostility between the two nations.

byline.contributor: Ellen Barry contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Azeri lawmakers condemned the work, by an Azeri writer, and protesters burned his portrait outside his house, illustrating the depth of hostility between the two nations.

headline.seo: Novella’s Sympathetic Portrayal of Armenians Causes Uproar in Azerbaijan
headline.main: Novella’s Sympathetic Portrayal of Armenians Causes Uproar in Azerbaijan
headline.print_headline: Novella’s Sympathetic Portrayal of Armenians Causes Uproar in Azerbaijan
